title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) enabling Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-like syntax.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI for chatting, pulling, and managing Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completions via Ollama (GitHub Copilot-style).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators & embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model; supports slash commands and thread context.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for using Ollama with LangChain, LlamaIndex, RAG, function-calling, and more.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package definition for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS and via flakes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation demo using Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain for private docs.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Streamlit GUI to chat with Ollama models without installing heavy front-end frameworks.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Tutorial showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B with your data and load the quantized model into Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio/hyper; published on crates.io as ‘ollama-rs’.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with per-channel model settings.
